4861f85c-702e-44f0-971c-b670129c03e1.name: Oxygen Storage
4861f85c-702e-44f0-971c-b670129c03e1.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

23a4b71a-c40f-42bd-9902-fc77625e2d08.name: Oxygen Storage
23a4b71a-c40f-42bd-9902-fc77625e2d08.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

89b14d69-df91-49f9-bdef-fefdf1f78512.name: Oxygen Storage
89b14d69-df91-49f9-bdef-fefdf1f78512.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

97eafa60-e99e-4503-9d13-f9a6e72e438e.name: Oxygen Storage
97eafa60-e99e-4503-9d13-f9a6e72e438e.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

d9261710-d624-4728-96bf-f8587659e6d5.name: Oxygen Storage
d9261710-d624-4728-96bf-f8587659e6d5.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

20e11c31-cb90-476a-8cf4-217d1ed52732.name: Flight
20e11c31-cb90-476a-8cf4-217d1ed52732.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

1595558e-7491-46bf-be15-d930a521bb30.name: Diffuse
1595558e-7491-46bf-be15-d930a521bb30.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

cc71ecd5-5302-44e4-947b-83a764b01f63.name: Homogenous
cc71ecd5-5302-44e4-947b-83a764b01f63.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

9dec891d-ce3b-4e50-a246-99dc711c6eef.name: No Blood
9dec891d-ce3b-4e50-a246-99dc711c6eef.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

b51e3f7c-6704-4242-a8bf-e52947a651ee.name: No Brain
b51e3f7c-6704-4242-a8bf-e52947a651ee.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

b2062fb9-b6f6-4bfc-b895-7b589326a23c.name: No Eyes
b2062fb9-b6f6-4bfc-b895-7b589326a23c.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

b2501fc7-d47c-4689-9a01-365c4cb55e9c.name: No Head
b2501fc7-d47c-4689-9a01-365c4cb55e9c.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

125a54ed-4474-49ca-9a95-b3c35b3efad9.name: No Neck
125a54ed-4474-49ca-9a95-b3c35b3efad9.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

632bc364-6486-45b8-ad77-27324342ad3e.name: No Vitals
632bc364-6486-45b8-ad77-27324342ad3e.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

48043ec2-7e6a-4d9b-bff4-a448dc358c9c.name: Unliving
48043ec2-7e6a-4d9b-bff4-a448dc358c9c.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

a2577d87-f679-4322-9156-5de94865117a.name: Usually On
a2577d87-f679-4322-9156-5de94865117a.notes: Turning visible costs 1 FP per second
